Package farm.game

Class Farm

  • java.lang.Object
    • farm.game.Farm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AfricanFarm, MediterraneanFarm, NewZealandFarm, NorthKoreanFarm
    public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the base class for all farms. A farm has a name, a type and farmer and contains a list of crops, a lost of animals, and the amount of money the farm currently has. The subclass of Farm instantiated will determine the crop growing speed and the animal bonuses.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Megan Steenkamp, Lewis Marshall

    • Constructor Detail

      • Farm

        public Farm​(java.lang.String type,
            float balance,
            int cropGrowthFactor,
            int animalHappinessFactor)
        Class constructor for the Farm class
        Parameters:
        type - Type of farm, based on geographical location.
        balance - Starting monetary balance for farm.
        cropGrowthFactor - Scale factor to add to the growth time of crops on purchase.
        animalHappinessFactor - Scale factor to add to the happiness of animals on purchase.

        public void addToAvailableCrops​(int num)
        Adds to the number of free crops available on the farm. Only accepts positive parameters.
        Parameters:
        num - The number of newly available crops.

      • getCropAndAnimalStatus

        public java.lang.String getCropAndAnimalStatus()
        Returns the status of the farm's crops and animals. This includes viewing a crop's time growing, the time left until crop's harvest and an animal's happiness and health levels.
        Returns:
        The status of all crops and animals.

      • withdrawMoney

        public float withdrawMoney​(float amount)
        Withdraws money from the farm's balance and returns it. If the amount to be withdrawn exceeds that of the balance, no money will be returned.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of money to be withdrawn.
        Returns:
        Money withdrawn.

      • addToBalance

        public float addToBalance​(float amount)
        Adds to monetary balance of the farm. Throws an exception is money is attempted to be deducted.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of money to add.
        Returns:
        The current balance of the farm.

      • addCrop

        public void addCrop​(FarmItem crop)
        Adds a new crop to the farm if there is a plot available. Throws an exception if there are no available crop plots left.
        Parameters:
        crop - Crop to be added.

      • removeCrop

        public void removeCrop​(Crop crop)
        Removes a crop from the farm. This function is used if a crop is harvested. If the crop given does not exist on the farm an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        crop - Crop to be removed.

      • addAnimal

        public void addAnimal​(FarmItem animal)
        Adds a new animal to the farm.
        Parameters:
        animal - Animal to be added.

        public java.lang.String getCropStatus()

        Returns:

      • getCropsReadyForHarvest

        public java.lang.String getCropsReadyForHarvest()
        Returns the details of all crops ready for harvest. If no crops are ready to be harvested, an empty string will be returned.
        Returns:
        The crops that are ready for harvest.

      • getCrop

        public FarmItem getCrop​(int type)
        Gets an crop of a given type, specified the type ID.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of crop, identified by an ID number.
        Returns:
        Crop if it is in the list of crops. Otherwise will return null.

      • ownsCrop

        public boolean ownsCrop​(int type)
        Whether the farm has a crop of a given type.
        Parameters:
        type - ID number of the crop type.
        Returns:
        True if crop is in stock. Else false.
